author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fullsix: Definitive Agreement To Swap Stake For MyAv Shares Signed
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - FULLSIX:
* SAID ON THURSDAY DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT FOR EXCHANGE OF FULLSIX SHARES HOLD BY BLUGROUP TO MYAV SHARES WAS SIGNED
* IT WAS DEFINED THAT 1,118.2 OF FULLSIX SHARES TO BE EXCHANGED FOR 100 MYAV SHARES
* DURING THE TRANSACTION OH SPA ACQUIRED 4.1 MLN OF FULLSIX SHARES EQUAL TO 36.25% SHARE CAPITAL
* CENTRO STUDI SRL ACQUIRED 1.0 MLN FULLSIX SHARES EQAUL TO 9.06% OF SHARE CAPITAL
* OH WILL LAUNCH PUBLIC EXCHANGE OFFER ON ALL FULLSIX SHARES
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
